javadoc:
The Strings stream contains null-terminated UTF8 strings.
 When the stream is present, the first entry is always the empty string.
 This stream may contain garbage in its unreachable parts.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the name of this stream.
@return The name of this stream.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Gets the name of this stream.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: header
params.comment: The stream header associated with this stream.

params.name: offset
params.comment: The reader offset where this stream starts.

params.name: rva
params.comment: The relative virtual address where this stream starts.

params.name: reader
params.comment: A reader that is used to read the stream.

throws.comment: if there is a problem reading the stream.

methods.name: getString
methods.comment: Gets the string at the given index.

params.name: index
params.comment: The index of the string to get.

return.comment:
The string at the given index.  Could be null if the index was invalid or there was
   a problem reading the string.

name: CliStreamStrings
comment:
The Strings stream contains null-terminated UTF8 strings.
 When the stream is present, the first entry is always the empty string.
 This stream may contain garbage in its unreachable parts.
